resources.string:
The graphics in the app where created using AI.
No internet connection required and thus no data are handled by QuestWeaver.

 As with any other data sharing platform, there are risks you need to be aware of.
If you share data to another device you are handing them over permission to see and use that data.
Please donâ€™t send sensitive information such as your bank details, passwords or your spellbook.
